title: I leveled an account to 30 in 1 week
body: I used a seven day xp boost and got the most out of it, thing is I now own a full rune page of the cheapest runes and 4 450ip champs.  Looks like ranked might take a bit.  But on a serious note riot you messed up letting people hit 30 so fast now without changing ip gains. There is no way to get 16 champs in a reasonable amount of time other than fwotd which will take a few weeks.
